Title: Error_ Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.SqlServer.BatchParser.dll' _ Community
Author: Christian Hauggaard
Text: You receive the following error:  An error occurred during executing this statement \r\n IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = OBJECT_ID(N'[<TableName>]') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsTable') = 1) DROP TABLE [<TableName>];: ExecuteNonQuery failed for Database '<DatabaseName>'. Microsoft.SqlServer.BatchParser.dll MicrosoftSQL Server 2016 Service Pack 2 Feature Pack

Lists.heading: Resolution
paragraphs: Download Microsoft SQL Server® 2016 Service Pack 2 Feature Pack and install the following packages:
